# rstatsvideo

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

[rstatsvideo](https://twitter.com/rstatsvideo) is a twitter-bot that shares youtube videos on R.

rstatsvideo shares the new videos from the youtube channels in the files "data/list_channel.txt".
